00031    CfbEndBase::CfbEndBase(McSystem& system) : 
00032       SystemMove(system),
00033       nTrial_(-1)

00042    /* 
00043    * Read parameter nTrial.
00044    */
00045    void CfbEndBase::readParam(std::istream& in) 
00046    {
00047       read<int>(in, "nTrial", nTrial_);
00048       if (nTrial_ <=0 || nTrial_ > MaxTrial_) {
00049          UTIL_THROW("Invalid value input for nTrial");
00050       }
00051    }
00052  
00053    /*
00054    * Configuration bias algorithm for deleting one atom from chain end.
00055    */
00056    void 
00057    CfbEndBase::deleteEndAtom(Atom* endPtr, Atom* pvtPtr, int bondType,
00058                             double &rosenbluth, double &energy)
00059    {
00060       Vector bondVec;
00061       Vector pvtPos = pvtPtr->position();
00062       double trialEnergy, lengthSq, length;
00063    
00064       // Calculate bond length of pvt-end bond
00065       lengthSq = boundary().distanceSq(pvtPos, endPtr->position());
00066       length   = sqrt(lengthSq);
00067 
00068       // Calculate current nonbonded pair energy of end atom
00069       #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00070       energy = system().pairPotential().atomEnergy(*endPtr);
00071       #else
00072       energy = 0.0;
00073       #endif
00074 
00075       #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00076       Species::AtomAngleArray angles;
00077       const Angle *anglePtr;
00078       const Atom  *pvtPtr2(NULL);
00079       Vector dr1, dr2;
00080       int    iAngle, angleTypeId(0);
00081       double rsq1, rsq2, cosTheta;
00082 
00083       if (system().hasAnglePotential()) {
00084 
00085          // Get the angle type and pointers of atoms forming the angle.
00086          endPtr->molecule().species().getAtomAngles(*endPtr, angles);
00087          for (iAngle = 0; iAngle < angles.size(); ++iAngle) {
00088             anglePtr = angles[iAngle];
00089             if (&anglePtr->atom(1) == pvtPtr) {
00090                if (&anglePtr->atom(0) == endPtr) {
00091                   pvtPtr2 = &anglePtr->atom(2);
00092                } else {
00093                   pvtPtr2 = &anglePtr->atom(0);
00094                }
00095                angleTypeId = anglePtr->typeId();
00096             }
00097          }
00098    
00099          // Calculate angle energy. 
00100          rsq1 = boundary().distanceSq(pvtPtr->position(),
00101                                       pvtPtr2->position(), dr1);
00102          rsq2 = boundary().distanceSq(endPtr->position(),
00103                                       pvtPtr->position(), dr2);
00104          cosTheta = dr1.dot(dr2) / sqrt(rsq1 * rsq2);
00105    
00106          energy += system().anglePotential().energy(cosTheta, angleTypeId);
00107 
00108       }
00109       #endif
00110 
00111       #ifdef INTER_EXTERNAL
00112       if (system().hasExternalPotential()) {
00113          energy += system().externalPotential().atomEnergy(*endPtr);
00114       }
00115       #endif
00116 
00117       // Rosenbluth factor = exp(-beta*(pair + angle + external))
00118       rosenbluth = boltzmann(energy);
00119       
00120       // Add bond energy of current pvt-end bond to energy.
00121       // This is the final value of inout energy parameter.
00122       energy += system().bondPotential().energy(lengthSq, bondType);
00123 
00124       // Loop over nTrial - 1 additional trial positions:
00125       for (int iTrial=0; iTrial < nTrial_ - 1; ++iTrial) {
00126 
00127          random().unitVector(bondVec);
00128          bondVec *= length;
00129          endPtr->position().add(pvtPos, bondVec);  
00130          boundary().shift(endPtr->position());
00131 
00132          #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00133          trialEnergy = system().pairPotential().atomEnergy(*endPtr);
00134          #else
00135          trialEnergy = 0.0;
00136          #endif
00137 
00138          #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00139          if (system().hasAnglePotential()) {
00140 
00141             // Get the angle type and atom pointer at the angle.
00142             endPtr->molecule().species().getAtomAngles(*endPtr, angles);
00143             for (iAngle = 0; iAngle < angles.size(); ++iAngle) {
00144                anglePtr = angles[iAngle];
00145                if (&anglePtr->atom(1) == pvtPtr) {
00146                   if (&anglePtr->atom(0) == endPtr) {
00147                      pvtPtr2 = &anglePtr->atom(2);
00148                   } else {
00149                      pvtPtr2 = &anglePtr->atom(0);
00150                   }
00151                   angleTypeId = anglePtr->typeId();
00152                }
00153             }
00154 
00155             // Calculate energy.
00156             rsq1 = boundary().distanceSq(pvtPtr->position(),
00157                                          pvtPtr2->position(), dr1);
00158             rsq2 = boundary().distanceSq(endPtr->position(),
00159                                          pvtPtr->position(), dr2);
00160             cosTheta = dr1.dot(dr2) / sqrt(rsq1 * rsq2);
00161    
00162             trialEnergy += system().anglePotential()
00163                                    .energy(cosTheta, angleTypeId);
00164          }
00165          #endif
00166 
00167          #ifdef INTER_EXTERNAL
00168          if (system().hasExternalPotential()) {
00169             trialEnergy += system().externalPotential()
00170                                    .atomEnergy(*endPtr);
00171          }
00172          #endif
00173 
00174          rosenbluth += boltzmann(trialEnergy);
00175       }
00176 
00177    }
00178    
00179   
00180    /*
00181    * Configuration bias algorithm for adding one atom to a chain end.
00182    */
00183    void
00184    CfbEndBase::addEndAtom(Atom* endPtr, Atom* pvtPtr, int bondType,
00185                           double &rosenbluth, double &energy)
00186    {
00187       Vector trialPos[MaxTrial_];
00188       Vector bondVec;
00189       Vector pvtPos = pvtPtr->position();
00190       double trialProb[MaxTrial_], trialEnergy[MaxTrial_];
00191       double beta, length;
00192       int    iTrial;
00193 
00194       #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00195       Species::AtomAngleArray angles;
00196       const Angle *anglePtr;
00197       const Atom  *pvtPtr2(NULL);
00198       Vector dr1, dr2;
00199       int    iAngle, angleTypeId(0);
00200       double rsq1, rsq2, cosTheta;
00201       #endif
00202    
00203       // Generate a random bond length
00204       beta   = energyEnsemble().beta();
00205       length = 
00206          system().bondPotential().randomBondLength(&random(), beta, bondType);
00207    
00208       // Loop over nTrial trial positions:
00209       rosenbluth = 0.0;
00210       for (iTrial=0; iTrial < nTrial_; ++iTrial) {
00211          random().unitVector(bondVec);
00212          bondVec *= length;
00213          // trialPos = pvtPos + bondVec
00214          trialPos[iTrial].add(pvtPos, bondVec); 
00215          boundary().shift(trialPos[iTrial]);
00216          endPtr->position() = trialPos[iTrial];
00217          #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00218          trialEnergy[iTrial] = system().pairPotential().atomEnergy(*endPtr);
00219          #else
00220          trialEnergy[iTrial] = 0.0;
00221          #endif
00222 
00223          #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00224          if (system().hasAnglePotential()) {
00225 
00226             endPtr->molecule().species().getAtomAngles(*endPtr, angles);
00227             for (iAngle = 0; iAngle < angles.size(); ++iAngle) {
00228                anglePtr = angles[iAngle];
00229                if (&anglePtr->atom(1) == pvtPtr) {
00230                   if (&anglePtr->atom(0) == endPtr) {
00231                      pvtPtr2 = &anglePtr->atom(2);
00232                   } else {
00233                      pvtPtr2 = &anglePtr->atom(0);
00234                   }
00235                   angleTypeId = anglePtr->typeId();
00236                }
00237             }
00238    
00239             // Get the angle spanned.
00240             rsq1 = boundary().distanceSq(pvtPtr->position(),
00241                                          pvtPtr2->position(), dr1);
00242             rsq2 = boundary().distanceSq(endPtr->position(),
00243                                          pvtPtr->position(), dr2);
00244             cosTheta = dr1.dot(dr2) / sqrt(rsq1 * rsq2);
00245    
00246             trialEnergy[iTrial] += system().anglePotential().
00247                                    energy(cosTheta, angleTypeId);
00248          }
00249          #endif
00250 
00251          #ifdef INTER_EXTERNAL
00252          trialEnergy[iTrial] += system().externalPotential().atomEnergy(*endPtr);
00253          #endif
00254 
00255          trialProb[iTrial] = boltzmann(trialEnergy[iTrial]);
00256          rosenbluth += trialProb[iTrial];
00257       }
00258    
00259       // Normalize trial probabilities 
00260       for (iTrial = 0; iTrial < nTrial_; ++iTrial) {
00261          trialProb[iTrial] = trialProb[iTrial]/rosenbluth;
00262       }
00263      
00264       // Choose trial position
00265       iTrial = random().drawFrom(trialProb, nTrial_);
00266    
00267       // Calculate total energy for chosen trial.
00268       energy = system().bondPotential().energy(length*length, bondType);
00269       energy += trialEnergy[iTrial];
00270    
00271       // Set position of new end atom to chosen value
00272       endPtr->position() = trialPos[iTrial];
00273 
00274    }
00275 
00276 }
